long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Google Chtome Extention to sort "MLB.com Prospect Watch" by position/name/rank(which is default key).

After installing this tool, you can sort prospects by adding a parameter on URL.

For example..

+ sort by position -> http://m.mlb.com/prospects/2018/?list=ari&sort=pos
+ sort by name     -> http://m.mlb.com/prospects/2018/?list=ari&sort=name
